biosimulators_utils.viz.vega.utils module¶

Utilities for working with Vega

Author

Jonathan Karr <karr@mssm.edu>

Date

2021-07-22

Copyright

2021, Center for Reproducible Biomedical Modeling

License

MIT

biosimulators_utils.viz.vega.utils.dict_to_vega_dataset(data_dict)[source]¶

Convert a dictionary of values, such as that produced by COBRApy, into a Vega dataset (array of data elements)

Parameters

data_dict (dict) – dictionary that maps the labels of predicted variables to their predicted values

Returns

list of data elements, each with two keys label and values` whose values

are the labels of each variable and an array of their predicted values

Return type

list
